page.title: 07Occupations in Milton Ernest
page.content: A survey of{Milton Ernest and {Radwell revealed that there is 2%{unemployment 12%{retirement}and 86% full or part time{employment}of the adult populace. 9% consider being a mother and house_ wife an occupation, 6% are students. 17% are in top managerial posts, 9% are self_employed, 3% are in the Armed Forces and 21% are employed by local government. There are people involved in Accountancy, Aviation, Banking, Building, Catering, Commerce, Craftwork, Domestic Work, Education, Electronics, Farming, Grooming, Journalism, Management, Motoring, Nursing, Policing, Selling, Science, Secretarial Work, Sport and Thatching. In addition there are Company Directors, Draughtsmen, Clerks, a Clerk in Holy Orders and Publicans.
